entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nested struct array throws TypeLoadException at runtime when type of nested struct array is defined with generics #67900
  • Debug assertion fails in MergedNamespaceSymbol #67898
  • Two source-build prebuilts #67894
  • Clarify errors around void expressions in switch expressions / Disallow them in switch exp. instead of propagating void #67889
    Backlog
  • Move the SyntaxTree and SemanticModel action based analyzers to respect context.FilterSpan #67888
    17.7
  • `IParameterSymbol.GetDocumentationCommentXml` for primary constructor parameters always return `string.Empty` #67886
    17.7

Closed

  • VB incorrectly allows access to a protected constructor from a shared member of a derived class #67130
    17.7
  • CS8602 Nullable warning is missing #66921
    17.7
  • Enums & generic math #66542
  • Ease understandability of incremental generators #67745
  • `IGeneratorContext.AddSource` throws ArgumentException wrongly claiming invalid filename on linux #67653
  • Source Generator is not reloaded since SDK 7.0.200 - .NET Host cache issue? #67388
    17.7
  • VB For Each issue #67134
    17.7
  • Switch statement error recovery improvements #67757
    17.7
  • Race condition bug in Formatter when requesting formatted changes for a sub-span in a file #67887

PullRequests

Created

  • Give more accurate information when we get an out of bounds error in LSP #67906
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.4 release branch #67903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.2 release branch #67902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Flow the telemetry update change from feature branch to 17.0 release branch #67901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add additional information to an argument exception #67899
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Refactoring CompletionHandler #67897
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make EnC service a MEF service instead of a workspace service #67896
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Use correct ref-pack versions #67895
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect oversimplification of 'default(T)' arguments #67893
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flatten merged namespaces #67891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use SymbolLocations.FirstOrDefault instead of TryGetFirstLocation #67890
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Filter out configure & suppress code fixers when it is not in VS LSP #67885
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Pool intermediary dictionaries use to create named type and namespace members #67727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Better recover from missing closing `}` or `]` in switch statements #67862
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Do not NGEN our build task #67892
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Additional places where locations can be avoided #67844
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 7.2.1.6856 #67875
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Seal WrappedParameterSymbol.HasUnscopedRefAttribute #67879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move tests down from editor features to features layer. #67883
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge ITextAndVersion and ITextVersionable #67847
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Pool node collections in analyzer driver. #67776
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Do not return file-local type requested by unmangled metadata name #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Interceptors: handle duplicates, additional signature validation, etc. #67786
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Initial pass at enabling prebuilt detection #67645
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Update code lens cache to use the syntax version #67884
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Implement ISymbol.LocationList #67881
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include diagnostic help URL in output #67836
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use non-void type for `BoundAwaitOperator` in VB statement #67822
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation, 17.7
  • Add `IsExplicitExtension` #67850
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Implement element access for inline array types #67830
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Add FilterSpan API to analyzer contexts #67818
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #67857
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
